# PS4 Granblue Fantasy: Relink

`CUSA34766.savepatch`

### 1. Max Current Weapons Level

Target File: `*`

```
80010005 FFF40A00
00000000 00000000
4E000011 05F5E0FF
01000018 00000000
```

```

2800000D 05F5E0FF
```
